item.description:
Act One Entertainments is having a 50th Anniversary party, celebrating 50 years in business and still going strong!

Johnny Parris and Leon's Restaurant invites you to come listen to bands from the past and present play all day and in to the night.

As the day turns to evening the stage will never get a chance to cool down. We will have a different act on stage every 15 minutes. Below is the full schedule. The music and party starts at 3:00pm and ends at 11:00pm Sunday evening.

3:00 No Big Deal

3:15 Meg Hackett

3:30 Jessica Prouty Band

3:45 Bird nâ€™ Boys

4:00 Avenue Groove

4:15 Dallas

4:30 Family Impact

4:45 Karen Wagner

5:00 Harvey

5:15 The James Clawdwell Band

5:30 The Herdd

5:45 TONY C

6:00 Red Satin

6:15 David Quick and Sidekick

6:30 Blood Brothers

6:45 Brian Mcdonald

7:00 Marble Collection

7:15 Robby Hasen & the Riot

7:30 OL Skool all stars

7:45 Elliot Lewis

8:00 Airborne

8:15 3 Speed Overdrive

8:30 The Bernadettes

8:45 The Mediums

9:00 Strawbed

9:15 Randell Holloway

9:30 Primetime

9:45 Dave Mack

10:00 Cover 2 Cover

10:15 Ronny Spataro & Lisa Campbell

10:30 Jasper Wrath

10:45 Super Surprise

11:00(BIG STAGE) Charlie Feracelli Act 1 All Star Band - singing America The Beautiful

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Act One Entertainments is having a 50th Anniversary party @ Leon's
